channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Post Shortcode
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Post Shortcode

item.title: CVE-2023-0526|2024-08-02T05:17:49.035Z -- unknown -- post%20shortcode
item.description: The Post Shortcode WordPress plugin through 2.0.9 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
